item.title: [RS2] Cammy teleporter help
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

Your code is too messy, here you go:

[code]program Teleporter;
{.include SRL/Srl.scar}

Var
t : Integer;

Const
HowMany = 3; // How many times to cast spell

Procedure Tab;
Begin
Writeln( 'You are using: Auto Teleporter Writen by bobert5696 and edited by Surajd ’ );
Mouse(739, 187, 10, 10, true); // Magic Tab
Wait(1000 + random( 250 ));
end;

Procedure Click;
Begin
Mouse(635, 299, 5, 5, true); //Cammy Teleport
t:= t + 1
Wait( 3000 + random( 250 ));
end;

Begin
Tab;
Repeat
Click;
Until( t = HowMany )
Writeln( 'Thanks for using Auto Teleporter by bobert5696 and edited by Surajd =D ’ );
End.[/code]

Added a Const for how many times to cast the spell, cleaned up the code

Cheers,
Surajd

Read full topic

item.title: [RS2] Cammy teleporter help
item.dc:creator: @wixter wixter
item.description:
@wixter wrote:

[code]program Teleporter;
{.include SRL/Srl.scar}
Var
t:integer;

procedure Tab;
Begin
Writeln(‘Auto Teleporter Writen by bobert5696’);
Mouse(739,187,10,10,true); // Magic Tab
Wait(1000+random(250));
end;

procedure Click;
Begin
Mouse(635,299,5,5,true);//Cammy Teleport
Wait(3000+random(250));
t:=0
t:=t+1
Repeat
Until(t=3)
end;

Begin
tab;
Click;
end.[/code]
try that?

item.title: [RS2] Cammy teleporter help

item.description:
@bobert5696 wrote:

[code]program Teleporter;
{.include SRL/Srl.scar}
Var
t:integer;

procedure Tab;
Begin
Writeln(‘Auto Teleporter Writen by bobert5696’);
Mouse(739,187,10,10,true); // Magic Tab
Wait(1000+random(250));

end;

procedure Click;
Begin
Mouse(635,299,5,5,true);//Cammy Teleport
Wait(3000+random(250));
t:=0
t:=t+1
Repeat
Until(t=3)
end;

Begin Tab;
Begin Click;

end;

end.
[/code]

sometimes it works, sometimes it doesnt, any suggestions?
